headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid KHC and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Kraft Heinz’s shares (currently trading at $24.96) have posted a disappointing 6.8% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 14.1% gain. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
